channel.title: [317 delta] npc dialog teleports?
channel.description:
how can you add a npc wich you can talk too, and gives you options...(just like party pete)
and you can choose from a few options... (teleport options for me)
like:
1. Where do you want to tele Click to continue
2. Varock Lumbridge Wildy

item.title: [317 delta] npc dialog teleports?
item.dc:creator: @rossy319 rossy319
item.description:
@rossy319 wrote:

I’ll show you an example of something i found
if(NPCID == 2790){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1;
}
if(NPCID == 945){
showInfo();
}
if(NPCID == 2633){
if (donator == 0) {
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(GetNpcName(2633), 4884);
sendFrame126(“You arent a donator.”, 4885);
sendFrame75(266, 4883);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
sM(“Check out the quest tab for more information on donating!”);
} else if (donator == 1) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 20;
}

Read full topic

item.title: [317 delta] npc dialog teleports?
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

i can help :[)
its very simple in client.java search the following

if(npcId =

then under neath that add the following

if(NPCID == 3781){
toX = 2657;
toY = 2639;
}

CODE BREAK DOWN:

if(NPCID == 3781){

If you click on the NPC 3781

toX = 2657;
toY = 2639;

Teleport to 2657, 2639
So all in all its if you click on 3781 (obviously you add the npc ID) then toX 2657 and toY 2639 (obviously add your cords there)
hope i helped. need help with anyother thing? PM ur teamviewer 5 ID and PASS

Read full topic
